scripts.prepare:local: mustache config/local.js layer1/subgraph.template.yaml > layer1/subgraph.yaml && mustache config/local.js layer2/subgraph.template.yaml > layer2/subgraph.yaml
scripts.prepare:goerli: mustache config/goerli.js layer1/subgraph.template.yaml > layer1/subgraph.yaml && mustache config/goerli.js layer2/subgraph.template.yaml > layer2/subgraph.yaml
scripts.build: yarn codegen && yarn build:l1 && yarn build:l2
scripts.deploy:local: cd layer1 && graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 moleculeprotocol/ipnft-subgraph
scripts.deploy:goerli:l1: cd layer1 && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ dorianwilhelm/ip-nft-subgraph-goerli
scripts.deploy:prod:l1: cd layer1 && graph deploy --product hosted-service moleculeprotocol/ip-nft-mainnet
scripts.deploy:prod:l2: cd layer2 && graph deploy --product hosted-service moleculeprotocol/ip-nft-frac-optimism
